interactivity.requirements: 15 Tsuneyo Affection You must have seen or permanently missed the following Events: Seen Main Events up to " Fireworks etc... "

progression.synopsis: Tsuneyo is tired, and Sensei again brings up the possibility of finding someone to help run Tojo Ramen. However, Tsuneyo does not want to trust the shop to other people. When Sensei says something that annoys her, she tries to employ her new knowledge of expletives, but unknowingly gets it wrong in a way that Sensei finds very entertaining. Yuki walks in just in time to hear, and promptly walks out again.

changelog: This Event was added in Update 0.13p2.
